title: Playing Game in Promo's and your Client Crashed Insta lose
body:
So I was minding my own business listening to a youtube video on a phone when your client crashed on me before I could pick. This gave me an instant loss and kicked me out of my promos. Like what the hell? How is that even allowed? And don't give me the "you'll get back there" response. Its ridiculous when I should have atleast one more game to play.

Sincerely a pissed off gamer.

replies.body:
During promotional matches, a dodge counts as a loss. Because a crash disconnects your client from the servers, the server registers it as a dodge. The most common cause of a sudden disconnection/crash in champ select is an unstable connection to the servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common solutions for unstable connection, and I recommend giving them a go so this situation is less likely to happen in the future.

If you continue to see issues after working through that guide, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Happened to me multiple times today. I feel your pain
